“That's no way to run a business.” You fold your arms, looking down a bit. Without the hat, she's about a full head shorter than you. “Nice hat, though.”

“...Thank you.” Her voice is oddly sultry, if a bit deadpan. “I apologize. I am an Artificer. Do you require my services?”

“Can you do anything with this bug heart?” You ask, producing the item from your UI.

“Mm. This is a Fire focus.” She giggles. “Pulsing, burning within. Give?”

“Just for a second.” You say, handing it over.

“Is that all?” You ask. “What does it do?”
